Welcome to mp_throttle’s documentation!¶

Warning

mp_throttle is currently in version 0.0.3 and not fully tested. Don’t use it for critical processes without testing and please report any bugs here

Note

mp_throttle can throttle your processes fairly accurate. However the precission highly depends on your system and the specific task. See Accuracy and calibration for more on this topic.

This module allows to throttle and monitor processes from Pythons multiprocessing package.
